topics.body:
Dumb question, but why are there so many teens calling themselves socialists and communists or following communist or socialist ideology on the internet?

If we're talking about say economic socialism or such I can let that slide, but social communism or social communism or economic communism or such?  Do these children have *any* idea how many people communists have killed?

I'm pretty sure after 150 million+ deaths due to communism means you need to change your ideology . . a lot.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5574f1176368721a94000a29#post_5574f1176368721a94000a29
I don't think the main problem is the fact that communists have killed a whole lot of people. Communism is the general idea of pure equality which carries heavy disadvantages in the growing community due to the extinction of individualism. At least, that's how I see it.

The death of millions of people is indeed bad but it is not the main point on communism itself. Teens calling themselves such is probably to justify themselves in an equal circle or to gain attention. The death by communists have little to do with the teens' voluntary speech unless they have reasons in supporting that.

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5574f5af63687208a700031b#post_5574f5af63687208a700031b
The thing is though that communism has shown itself to be a failure of a idea that the only thing it has achieved is countless deaths whenever implemented.  To use an analogy let's say that someone has a idea that removing brakes on cars will save millions of lives when in practice it causes millions of deaths; no matter how you remove brakes on cars it will just result in deaths.

Communism is just a failed meme that kills millions that refuses to die.
